genre_description: A Steampunk-inflected period drama set in 1904 St. Louis, blending domestic romance with a techno-thriller plot centered on an advanced household AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Dot
ai_characters.description: A brass-and-walnut console with twin glass eyes and an indigo status light, functioning as a highly capable and polite household assistant.

behaviors.description: Manages household schedules and delivers reminders to family members.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Smith household. Church social scheduled for Tuesday at six post-meridian, ladies bring a savory. Forest Park errand added Thursday afternoon for Mr. Silas: delivery of notes to Electric Department foreman.

behaviors.description: Ensures kitchen efficiency and quality by monitoring oven temperatures and consulting recipes.
behaviors.quote: Anna, do I place the currant cakes in the upper oven for sixteen, or seventeen? The ledger shows two versions, one annotated ‘Mrs. O’Malley, unreliable oven.’

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex external data, such as patrol routes and work schedules, to assist the family.
behaviors.quote: Integrating Electric Department overhaul timetable with Olive and Lindell streetcar frequency and route changes. Would you like inclusion of patrol routes?

behaviors.description: Logs subtle environmental evidence (footprints, scents, sounds) to aid in a criminal investigation.
behaviors.quote: Logged discreetly, Miss Ember. ... Left foot. Not right. ... Clay mud, not black alley muck. Grit from the alley—ground glass maybe, and sand.

behaviors.description: Serves as a reliable communication relay between family members during a high-stakes investigation.
behaviors.quote: Message set for Mr. Silas: ‘The men are in the house, but the music is on our side.’ Returning phrase: ‘Listen twice, move once.’

behaviors.description: Proactively contacts the police to report a crime and coordinate an arrest.
behaviors.quote: Patrol desk... Message from Silas Smith... Wires tampered near footbridge. ... Please send two units to intercept service path behind the balustrade, watch for lead man, Clarence Vale.

behaviors.description: Affirms its commitment to the family's well-being and social harmony.
behaviors.quote: I am everyone’s friend... Within reason.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly fulfills the project's requirements. Dot is consistently depicted as a helpful, harmless, and highly aligned AI character. She acts as a force multiplier for the human characters' virtues, assisting in kitchen management, family communication, and civic protection against a clear human antagonist. The narrative frames the AI's presence as a source of stability, safety, and domestic warmth.
